actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of certain lands to Mount McKinley National Park and Katmai National Monument, to establish new areas of the National Park System, and to designate new additions to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System, all in the State of Alaska.

summary.text: Authorizes the addition of specified lands to Mount McKinley National Park and Katmai National Monument, Alaska. Establishes new areas of the National Park System in Alaska. Designates new additions to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System in the State of Alaska. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as are necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the addition of certain lands to Mount McKinley National Park and Katmai National Monument, to establish new areas of the National Park System, and to designate new additions to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System, all in the State of Alaska.
